nodes.text: Wrist rocket launchers were miniaturized missile launchers capable of being worn on the wrist. They fired various types of wrist rockets, including darts and small missiles. They were a favorite of bounty hunters due to their discreet nature, versatility, and power. Bounty hunter Mira used a wrist rocket launcher as her trademark weapon. Another model of wrist rocket launcher was the Kelvarex Consolidated Arms MM9 rocket system, which was used by bounty hunter Boba Fett.
